News.headline: Daggers vs. Macclesfield Town Hospitality Special
News.page_title: Daggers vs. Macclesfield Town Hospitality Special
News.URL_keywords: Daggers vs. Macclesfield Town Hospitality Special
News.short_description: Don't forget about our Hospitality special for the Daggers vs. Macclesfield Town game.
News.description:
Watch the Daggers in style next month with a special on hospitality packages for our Vanarama National League fixture against Macclesfield Town on Saturday 22th October reduced to just £45.00 per person and £25.00 per person for season ticket holders (usually £65.00).

A massive saving is on offer for any fans wanting to watch the Daggers in style this October. The matchday hospitality package includes the following:

·Three course carvery meal
·Complimentary match day programme and team sheet
·Half time refreshments
·Seat in the sponsors box

The game kicks off at 3.00pm with lunch served from 1pm. 

For more information or to make a booking please contact the clubs commercial department on commercial@daggers.co.uk or call 0208 592 1549 Ext. 33.

Please note that last orders for the hospitality will be at 12:00 on Wednesday for the game.
